name: Cards of Destiny: Prologue-> Curse of the fallen stars
name_original: Cards of Destiny: Prologue-> Curse of the fallen stars
description:
Knight Yoru, protector of Atena,

the princess Atelia has requested 
that you collected 3 stars
fragments that when missing from the vault. 
They were detected around the town of Castellia!

Unfortunately, the stars have turned 
the villager into the monster. 
Chaos has broken into town.
To save them, Collect the stars!

Your sword should protect you from the star's power.
However, you are only allowed to use the double jump power [Space]. We have prepared Magic lenses, 
you can focus [L] to find secrets

In name of princess 
Elisabetta Atelia Notrono

We wish you the best of luck! 
Alfard William, Head Buttle.
